Text: Matthew Campbell Contact InfoHello to all I want to thank each of you for the wonderful experience and the opportunity to work with you I had a great time at Enron and was blessed to have been involved in such a great company More than the company was the opportunity to meet and work with truly intelligent and down to earth people You guys are great and I hope that someday we will cross paths again Take care and if you ever need any help outside of work let me know Regards Matthew Campbell mailto
